Description: We are hiring a Beautician for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 1-2 years of experience.
Proficient in manicure, pedicure, waxing, threading, and nail art.
Knowledge in hair styling, hair cutting, coloring, hair treatment services, applying makeup, facials, and recommending skin care services.
Good communication skills
Must show photos/videos of previous work.
Knowledge about henna designs will be a plus.
Nationality: Filipino
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar
